Articles.Content: Is there a way to edit a save file so that all the research has been researched automatically, in Career Mode? Alternatively, is there a way to activate Mission Control & Contracts in Sandbox Mode?

Welcome to the forums! There is an even easier way than editing the savefile

Start a new career save. Press Alt+F12 to open the debug menu.

Now, hold down the Alt key continuously, until an additional set of buttons appears in the debug menu.

Find the button that says "Max Research", and press it. Voila - all technology has been researched, but everything else is still a brand new career save.

Edited April 10, 2016 by Streetwind
